item.title: About
item.description:
Andrew Perkins is Chair of the Department of Marketing and International Business at Washington State University’s Carson College of Business. He is the author of After the Grind: Rethinking Your Business Career in the Age of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics, available in paperback and e-book.

This site features daily essays on AI, the future of work, and what it means to be a professional when the machines can do the tasks.

For inquiries, reach out via WSU’s Carson College of Business.
